features: POWERFUL PERFORMANCE: With a CADR of 130 CFM / 221 m3/h, the Vital 100 is perfect for living rooms, bedrooms, and kitchens. It can cover 300 ft² / 28 m² in only 18 minutes. (Only products over 6 pounds can be equipped with such powerful motors that optimize the air cleaning performance).Voltage: AC 120V, 60Hz

3-STAGE FILTRATION: Comes equipped with a washable pre-filter for large particles like lint and fur, a High-Efficiency Activated Carbon Filter for toxic fumes and unpleasant odors, and an HEPA Filter, which captures at least 99.97% of dust, pollen, and any airborne particles with a size of 0.3 microns (µm)
SLEEP COMFORTABLY: With noise levels as low as 23 decibels, the Vital 100 won’t keep you up at night. You can also turn off the display lights when it’s time for bed
USER-FRIENDLY: Set a timer for 2, 4, or 8 hours whenever you like. The Check Filter Indicator will let you know when it’s time for a fresh filter
ENERGY EFFICIENT: It only costs dollar 1.66 a week to run the Vital 100 24/7 , allowing you to use it all day during times of high pollution, like wildfire season
EASY TO PLACE: The compact design and top-facing air vents let you place the Vital 100 near walls or in the corner of a room

FILTER REPLACEMENTS: Depending on usage, the filters should be replaced every 6–8 months. You can buy new filters by searching "B08BC5V6ZF" and "B085C22XWC". Remove the plastic wrap before installing a new filter
body.description: Levoit air purifiers avoid using UV-C light, an air cleaning method that research has shown can produce harmful ozone and secondary pollution. Please follow the details and FAQs below.Q: How safe are UV purifiers?The biggest issue with UV purifiers is that they emit varying levels of ozone. Even very small amounts of ozone in the air may result in chest pain, coughing, shortness of breath, and throat irritation. In fact, The World HealthOrganization (WHO) has issued a warning against people using UV light to sterilize their hands or any other part of their skin.Q: How effective are UV purifiers?Not very. Microbes have to spend some time in front of the UV light before they’re destroyed. The EPA explains that microbes must be exposed to the light “on the order of minutes and hours rather than the few seconds typical of most UVGI air cleaners".

Clean the outside of the filter with a brush or vacuum each month to prevent buildup of hair or dust. Do not clean the filter with water or other liquid., On average, the filter should be replaced every 6-8 months

3-Stage Filtration Keep your home safe from a wide variety of airborne particles and pollutants, including allergens, fumes, and unpleasant odors. Get Filter Washable Pre-Filter Wash your pre-filter once a month to continue trapping larger particles like lint and pet fur and protect the HEPA filter. Get Filter Activated Carbon Filter Powerfully adsorbs pet odors, cooking smells, smoke, and VOCs to ensure your air is truly fresh. Get Filter HEPA Filter The HEPA filter of the 3-in-1 filter removes at least 99.97% of dust, pollen, and any airborne particles with a size of 0.3 microns (µm) Get Filter
Which is the right air purifier for you?

Whisper-Quiet Operation With noise levels as low as 23dB, you can sleep soundly while the Vital 100 refreshes your air. Convenient Timer Function No need to wonder if you left the air purifier on—set a timer for 2, 4, or 8 hours. 100% Ozone-Free Purify your air without UV light so those with ozone sensitivities won’t experience coughing and irritation. Compact Design Place the Vital 100 near the wall to keep your space fresh and open. Fresh Air at the Touch of a Button Easily clean your home with the intuitive control panel and convenient features.

Bedroom Put the Vital 100 in your bedroom for cleaner air and a better sleep environment. Living Room Enjoy healthier playtime in the living room with the Vital 100’s powerful air-purifying technology. Kitchen Put Vital 100 in the kitchen, easily remove the odor and smoke.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent filters for home
reviews.reviewText: We moved into a 95 year old home, and I bought four of these to mitigate dust, mold, environmental and pet allergens for my family. We run ours continuously. Quiet operation and easy to clean. Filters last for months, and Replacement filters easily found on Amazon as well. Worth the price for me. No problems with operation whatsoever in one time year of continuous operation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and effective for dust and allergens
reviews.reviewText: We moved into an incredibly dusty townhouse, I have terrible allergies, and we discovered our neighbors are chain smokers. We now have 3 Levoit air purifiers in our home: Vital 100 (non-smart version), Core Mini and Vital 200S.I initially bought the Vital 100 and put it in our bedroom because I have terrible allergies. It collected a ton of dust and helped a lot with the allergies. I thought I didn't need the smart version but in hindsight the availability of specialty filters and the remote control would be very helpful. It's relatively quiet although on high it's too noisy for me to sleep with. I absolutely love that you can turn the all the control lights off. We tried using this for the cigarette smell but it wasn't very effective except when the smell was very light. It did completely abolish cooking smells though. If I could go back in time I would have ordered the 100S instead but this one works fine.The smoke smell from the neighbors comes into our house through the laundry room which is a very small room. I bought the Core Mini to try to combat it. The Core Mini doesn't really do much to get rid of smells and was definitely overwhelmed by the smoke so now we move it around the house now when the pollen level is high. It works ok for dust and allergens but the range isn't great; you need to be right next to it to notice a difference. On low and medium speed it's barely audible and high is relatively quiet but overall the fan isn't very powerful. The lights on this one automatically turn off after a few seconds making it bedroom friendly. If I could do it again, I would have skipped this one and bought one of the larger ones sooner.Lastly, in an attempt to mitigate the smoke coming from next door, we got the big boi Vital 200S with the add on smoke specialty filter. So far it isn't able to completely remove the smell but it does cut down the severity and will clear it eventually provided the source stops for long enough. It's amazingly quiet on all 4 speeds and the fan moves a ton of air around. I'm disappointed that the auto mode doesn't detect the smoke smell but I can use the app to turn it to high speed as soon as I smell it. You don't have to use the app but it's really easy to set up and connect. The app allows you to set schedules which is really handy and as I touched on earlier, it works as a remote control. As with the others, you're able to turn the lights off completely so it's good for bedrooms. We've only had this running a few days but I'm pretty impressed with what it can do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does a GREAT job for it's size
reviews.reviewText: I love the size as I purchased this for my son's new dorm room. We previously purchased one for my daughter's bedroom. Our large dog sleeps with her. This controls both the short hair that he sheds as well as "big dog" smell. Every house guest we have tells us how unbelievable it is that we have a big dog in the house because there is no hint of odor and no hair everywhere. I attribute that to vacuuming regularly and this air purifier. Also, it is small and unassuming so it is perfect for a smaller space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good purifier, touchy controls
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this air purifier in my bedroom for the past few months. Overall, it's a solid unit that improves the air quality and provides soothing white noise for better sleep. The simple touch controls and digital display allow me to easily adjust the fan speed before bed. I like that I can also set a timer so it automatically shuts off after a few hours.The filtration seems effective and I've noticed less dust in my room since using it. My only real complaint is that the touch controls can be finicky at times. One night, I went to turn it on and tapped the power control, all the light lit up, but nothing happened. I tapped the speed control and it took the unit 1-5 mins to start producing airflow. Had to unplug and plug back in to reset and eventually fixed itself. It might have something to do with software.Other than that minor hiccup, I've been pleased with the air purifier. It's quiet, easy to use, and seems to genuinely make a difference in air quality. For the price, it's a good value in my opinion. I would recommend it to anyone looking for an affordable way to filter dust and allergens from a medium or large room. Just be aware the touch controls may be temperamental on occasion. But it continues to run well for me as a nightly air purifier and white noise machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Noticeable difference in the air in my apartment, very quiet and easy to move around
reviews.reviewText: When I moved into my apartment in an old building, it had a kind of dusty smell, my throat was getting dry, and I was coughing a bit. I thought it had to do with the dust levels in the place or the previous resident's pet dander. I got this air purifier and within a day or two I no longer was coughing and it's been great. Sometimes when I don't turn it on for a while my coughing starts up again mildly, but turning it back on solves the problem. It's also pretty effective on cooking smells.On the 1 setting, the purifier is practically silent. On 2 you might hear it if you're close to it and on 3 you'll definitely hear it from across the room but it's not an unpleasant sound -- just like a quiet fan. I've seldom needed to turn it up to 3 (except for the time I burned some toast). It's pretty light and has a built-in cut-out to pick it up with one hand to move around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Effective and Affordable
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for an air filter that would be effective but wouldn't break the bank. I was also searching for one that could filter smoke particles, as I live in a part of the USA that has a smoke season now, thanks to rising global temps. This one is excellent. It gets burnt smoke out of my home in the summer, and cooking scents/smoke out of my home in winter! Indoor pollution is rife and bad for health, and this thing fixes it! I did research to make sure the filter can filter smoke particles and it can, so this is a good choice for that.
Tiene apenas 6 meses de uso y no prende, me gustaría contactar al vendedor pero Amazon no da la opción.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Good unit, but beware it’s not made to be used in the UK
reviews.reviewText: ***Edit - Have upgraded to 4 stars as the third unit has been working very well with the power adapter.***I haven’t tried sleep mode on this, and it’s a pretty noisy machine compared to another filter that I have of around the same size.I am on my 3rd machine now as the first two suddenly started smelling like they were burning and stopped working. I was a little surprised when it arrived with an American plug, but it came with a converter so I thought nothing of it. Later, when the replacement unit had gone the way of the first in only 2 days of light use, I read the specifications and saw that it’s not made to work on the UK 240v circuit. It’s only rated for 110v, so no wonder they kept burning out, I’m only glad they didn’t start a fire!Thankfully the seller was very god and even sent me a power converter - 240v to 110v - to get the unit working. But please be aware if you buy this unit that it’s not safe for use in the Uk with just a plug adapter.So 3 stars and a warning. But I’ll try the new unit with the converter and hopefully can say lovely things about it, it did seem to work nicely the first time before it burned out. I bought it to keep me safer from catching covid at home or in the office with my 2 coworkers.
シャープの空気清浄機を持っているが猫の毛対策に寝室用に購入お陰様でクシャミが出なくなりましたとても優秀ですフィルターの掃除の度に猫の毛をギッシリ採ってくれているので買った甲斐がありました

Lo he usado en un área un poco mayor a lo que está diseñado y funciona muy bien, el olor de 2 perros y cigarro casi desaparece usandolo en promedio 2 horas por la noche con ventanas cerradas en la mínima potencia la cual es muy silenciosa, a máxima potencia el ruido es parecido a un ventilador de techo, pero no he tenido la necesidad de usarlo así, al colocarlo donde está la mayor actividad incluso las recamaras se siente el aire más fresco, ya que no deja que se extienda el olor a cigarro o a mascota.
